How much of the variance of Y is explained by the independent variables?

Answerlist
----------
* 91.932%
* 0.000%
* 17.2%
* 20.8%

Solution
========





You can calculate the R<sup>2</sup> by (total sum of squares - residual)
/ total sum of squares = 0.172  
  
If you want to know more about the explained variance, the R<sup>2</sup>
watch this
[clip](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s4iAV-ag640&list=PLyLpEs0x9BnnDik99xLBH1yxkUCL4E7jk&index=2).
